title: AM Spiel: No Room for Gloom
description:
A Quick & Dirty Dissection of Day 3 of the Democratic National Convention, where heavy hitters lined up to vaunt the nominee President Obama called “the woman in the arena.”
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Peach Fish Productions
itunes:subtitle: Would that all the country’s problems were as surmountable (and mockable) as Donald Trump.
